citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:57am on January
8, 2024.
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the posted phone numbers listed on the
sign at the top of the facility’s driveway. Voicemails were left on each of the phone numbers. The inspector waited 30
minutes before leaving the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:57am on January 
8, 2024. 
 
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the posted phone numbers listed on the 
sign at the top of the facility’s driveway. Voicemails were left on each of the phone numbers. The inspector waited 30 
minutes before leaving the facility. 
 
 
End Section
